note:
I'm a biophysicist by training interested in the pedagogy of music and physics. My current work involves the creation of a rhythm game written in pygame meant to help students learn how to play conga, write python, and understand fourier transforms for audio analysis.

I also run a pickup baseball nonprofit that meets in Oakland by the Caldecott Tunnel every Sunday at noon to hit, throw, and catch baseballs for free.

And I take and edit photos for ProBonoPhoto.org using Darktable.

fields.name: fediscience account
